definition: to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: They trafficked in smuggled goods openly.
sentences.chinese: 他們公開地販賣走私貨。

sentences.english: The government has confiscated the illegally imported goods.
sentences.chinese: 政府已扣押了那批走私貨。

sentences.english: Contraband goods were found in his house.
sentences.chinese: 在他的房子裏發現了走私貨。

sentences.english: He claimed to be the rightful heir.
sentences.chinese: 他聲稱自己合法地買了走私貨。

sentences.english: The customs officials confiscated the contraband.
sentences.chinese: 政府已扣押了那批走私貨。

sentences.english: Nowadays, resemble peddling avowedly on Internet so the net shop of contraband is not little.
sentences.chinese: 如今，像這樣在互聯網上公然叫賣走私貨的網店不少。
